scripts.serve:static: yarn concurrently "nodemon --ext js,vue --ignore ./dist/ --exec 'rm -rf ./dist/ && yarn gridsome build && yarn http-server -c-1 ./dist/'"
scripts.serve:local: yarn concurrently "nodemon --ext js,vue --ignore ./dist/ --exec 'rm -rf ./dist/ && export NODE_ENV=development && yarn gridsome build && yarn http-server -c-1 ./dist/'"
